description: This file serves as the server entry point for a Remix application, handling HTTP requests, setting CORS headers, and rendering the React application to a stream. It manages both bot and browser requests and uses server-side rendering with streaming.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main handler for incoming HTTP requests that determines if the request is from a bot or browser and delegates to specialized handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering of the app when the requesting user is identified as a bot, using React's streaming API.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for regular browser requests, using React's streaming API.
